Zamora's Historical Mansion ™

  • SW Pottery and Jewelry
  • Souvenirs of New Mexico
  • Enjoy True New Mexican Food!
  • Book a Hot Air Balloon Ride!
  • Designer Hats Boutique
  • Contact Us
Zamora's Historical Mansion comprises the southeastern corner of Old Town Plaza, Albuquerque. The family-owned business has been passed from generation to generation since the early 1800's. The property currently comprises one restaurant and four retail stores, two of which are family-operated.
  • Plaza Indian Trading Post Jewelry Boutique
  • Plaza Primorosa Gift Shop
  • Casa de Fiesta Mexican Grill
  • Discover Balloons
  • Old Town Hat Shop and Accessories
